Class JoystickButton

extends BaseButton

      • JoystickButton

        public JoystickButton(int joystick,
                      int... joystickButtons)
        Creates a new JoystickButton.
        Parameters:
        joystick - The joystick. Should be one of the GLFW.JOYSTICK values.
        joystickButtons - The buttons on the joystick being checked.
